title: Digital Marketer
job_overview:
We are a Managed Service Provider and Web Development Company that wants to begin using Go High Level with an experienced digital marketer who can design, implement, and manage the ongoing campaigns with funnels, drip, AI agents, and every other aspect of Go High Level for us first, if we like the work also for our clients.

Our first goal in the funnels and advertisements is to generate first-time appointments (FTA) with other businesses that require IT/Technical Support and Cybersecurity services. Our customer goals may vary.

We are seeking weekly reports on CAC, ROAS, and show-up rates for scheduled meetings.

Applicants must include:
1. A resume and details of previous experience running GoHighLevel.
2. Software tools they already have access to and can leverage for this job
3. All the software tools for which we must provide licenses.
4. Description of why CAC and ROAS are critical in our business use case
5. Description of how you have used funnels and drip campaigns to produce FTAs (first-time appointments) with new prospects.
6. Portfolio of websites and images you've made

We are looking for expert-level skills with GoHighLevel, Web Design, SEO, SEM, and AI Tools.

Your personality must be highly organized with a high attention to detail. 

English must be impeccable, both spoken and written.
